group_1.textRight: All right! We did it!@We beat the Familiar!

group_1.textLeft: That was perfect!@Second time's the charm, huh!

group_1.textRight: Whew, that was a close one...@It almost got away again...
...Now, Emiri!@I was in the middle of warning you to—
H-huh?[se:7226_shock]
Asuka, we're in!@The Witch's Nest...!

group_1.textLeft: Whoa! Check this place out!@Where are we?!

group_1.textRight: This is where the Witch is...@[chara:300400:lipSynch_0](She's just so hyper...)
It looks like defeating @the Familiar brought it out.
Anyway, we need to be on guard!@Understand, Emiri?

group_1.textLeft: I've never seen anything like this!@This is like totally rad![chara:300600:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]

group_1.textRight: Hey, don't go wandering off again!
...Here she comes!
Oh my god! Is that a Witch?@It is, isn't it?!
That's right!@That's why I told you to be careful!
Huh? ...Ah!@[chara:101300:motion_000]Look how many hostages she has...!

group_1.textLeft: Huh? What's that?@You mean they're in love with her?

group_1.textRight: No!
A Witch can control a person by giving@them a Witch's Kiss...

group_1.textLeft: So you mean all those people are like...@totally spaced out or somethin'?

group_1.textRight: (Kind of [chara:101300:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]like you...)
Anyway, just think of them as hostages...
Okay, first we need to save those people!

group_1.textLeft: Hang on!@First we need to beat the Witch!
If we take it out, it solves everything!@Let's concentrate on it!

group_1.textRight: But we don't know what will happen@to those people!
Rescuing them is more important!
Rescue!
Rescue!
What?!
What?![chara:101300:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]

group_1.textLeft: Whoa, scary...!@Ya know, I was just thinking...[chara:300600:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json:motion_000]
Maybe Sasaran can go and@like...rescue the hostages...

group_1.textRight: ...Okay...

group_1.textLeft: I'm sure the Witch will totally go@after Sasaran when she does that...
All while Asukyan is waiting for the@perfect time to go, like, bam! Right?

group_1.textRight: B-brilliant!
Y-yeah, that's it!@She's right![chara:300400:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_001.exp.json]
...Such a simple idea... But we overlooked it@because we both got so worked up.

group_1.textLeft: I can like help out on either side!

group_1.textRight: Okay, thanks!
All right then...@Let's get this fight[chara:101300:motion_100] started!
